3.NF.A.title: Fractions as Numbers (Grade 3)
3.NF.A.objective: Identify, place, and compare fractions; simple equivalence; number line.

facts.skills: identify a/b as a parts of size 1/b; visual/area reasoning
facts.prompt: A strip is divided into 2 equal sections. 1 sections are blue. What fraction of the strip is blue?
